GapFillInput.Title: Reported speech and reported questions
GapFillInput.Instruction: Put the sentences into reported speech. Type your answers in the gaps.

Content.Question:
1. ‘I’m furious!’ my mother said to me.
My mother told me she was|me that she was furious.
2. Will said ‘I’m going to the gym.’
Will said he was going|that he was going to the gym.
3. ‘Jon has just bought a new car,’ said Hugo.
Hugo told us Jon had just bought|that Jon had just bought a new car.
4. ‘We enjoyed our holiday very much,’ said Beth.
Beth said they'd enjoyed their|they had enjoyed their holiday very much.
5. ‘I’ve never flown before,’ the woman said.
The woman said she'd never flown|that she'd never flown|she had never flown|that she had never flown before.
6. ‘Are you feeling okay?’ she asked me.
She asked me if I was feeling|whether I was feeling okay.
7. ‘Where did you stay in Goa?’ Tim wanted to know.
Tim wanted to know where I had stayed|where we had stayed|where I'd stayed|where we'd stayed in Goa.
8. ‘Are you from Brazil?’ she asked.
She asked me if I was|if I was|whether I was|me whether I was from Brazil.
9. ‘Will you lend me that DVD?’ George asked.
George asked me if I would lend him|if I'd lend him|whether I would lend him|whether I'd lend him that DVD.
10. ‘I saw Jo here yesterday.’
He said he had seen Jo there the day before|he'd seen Jo there the day before|he had seen Jo there the previous day|he'd seen Jo there the previous day.
